name: Dice Builder (Zachstudios_Yt)
description:
Made in 48 hours by Zach Dukes for the GMTK 2022 Jam

You are a board game designer who was sucked into your own game. You must use the limited tiles you have to get out. Sadly, the dice decide what tiles you can use. This is a level designer mixed with the theme Roll of the dice.  Please enjoy the game and have fun.
